body.name: BouncyBand Sit & Twist Active Seat Cushion – 12” D Sensory Cushion for Kids Up to 300lbs – Sensory Tool Promotes Active Learning and Improves Focus and Productivity
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 23 hrs 36 mins
features: ACTIVE SEATING FOR KIDS – The patent pending 120-degree rotating pivot disc smoothly spins for active movement, enabling children to silently twist and turn. The non-skid base keeps the sensory fidget toy secure on a chair or on the floor.

IMPROVE FOCUS – Provide an outlet for excess energy and enable kids to stay on task and be more productive with the sensory seat cushion. The sensory aid seat relaxes kids, increasing their ability to focus while working in the classroom and at home.
SENSORY CUSHION SEAT – The ever-changing positions of the sensory cushion for kids provide sensory input to calm children who can’t sit still.

MIND BODY BENEFITS – Movement awakens imagination, strengthens muscles, and promotes the development of balance. The fidget cushion enables children to move releasing pent up energy creating a calming and soothing environment.

DURABLE AND PORTABLE – Versatile, lightweight, and comfortable, the fidget cushion measures 12” in diameter and supports up to 300 lbs. Made of vinyl, the sensory relief seat is easy to wipe clean. The fidget seat cushion is great for school and at home.
body.description: Provide an outlet for excess energy and enable kids to stay on task and be more productive with the BouncyBand Sit & Twist Active Seat Cushion. The kids focus seat relaxes kids, increasing their ability to focus while working in the classroom and at home. The patent pending 120-degree rotating turning disc smoothly spins for active movement, enabling children to silently twist and turn. The ever-changing positions of the fidget seat cushion for kids provide sensory input to calm children who can’t sit still. Movement awakens imagination, strengthens muscles, and promotes the development of balance. This focus tool enables children to move releasing pent up energy creating a calming and soothing environment. The sensory cushion seat for kids is great for school and at home. The non-skid base keeps the focus tool for kids secure on a chair or on the floor. Versatile, lightweight, and comfortable, the vinyl seat cushion measures 12” in diameter, supports up to 300 lbs, and is safety tested. Made of vinyl, the sensory play tool is easy to wipe clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great motion but may not lay flat on chair surface
reviews.reviewText: Loving the motion of this seat. Only downfall is that q majority of chairs in schools are not flat and have slight curves so this cushion doesn’t lay flat on the sitting surface. It could easily become a distraction for younger kids.
